title: Ghost in the Council
description: For all her life, Caina has served as a Ghost of the Empire, one of the Emperor's spies and assassins.  Now the Empire teeters on the precipice of ruin. If Caina cannot forge an alliance among the lords of the Empire, the brutal sorcerers of the Umbarian Order will enslave mankind.  After they have taken their vengeance upon Caina...
author: Jonathan Moeller
